author: Special Correspondent
text: Sections of society in rural Thanjavur district on Saturday voiced their consternation and protest through staging fasts and demonstration demanding the Supreme Court to remove the ban on organising jallikkattu. Led by Youth Association president Dennis Amalraj, youths staged a protest fast at Thirukkannoorpatti demanding removal of the ban while members of the Jallikkaattu Federation, led by Lourdusamy, took out a procession in Vallam and staged a demonstration urging the Centre and the State governments to intervene and force the issue in the Supreme Court.
title: Protests continue against SC verdict on jallikattu
